sn15.3:1.3: Pubba koti na pannayati avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam sandhavatam samsaratam.
sn15.3:1.4: Tam kim mannatha, bhikkhave, katamam nu kho bahutaram, yam va vo imina dighena addhuna sandhavatam samsaratam amanapasampayoga manapavippayoga kandantanam rodantanam assu passannam paggharitam, yam va catusu mahasamuddesu udakan”ti?
sn15.3:1.5: “Yatha kho mayam, bhante, bhagavata dhammam desitam ajanama, etadeva, bhante, bahutaram yam no imina dighena addhuna sandhavatam samsaratam amanapasampayoga manapavippayoga kandantanam rodantanam assu passannam paggharitam, na tveva catusu mahasamuddesu udakan”ti.
sn15.3:2.1: “Sadhu sadhu, bhikkhave, sadhu kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, evam dhammam desitam ajanatha.
sn15.3:2.2: Etadeva, bhikkhave, bahutaram yam vo imina dighena addhuna sandhavatam samsaratam amanapasampayoga manapavippayoga kandantanam rodantanam assu passannam paggharitam, na tveva catusu mahasamuddesu udakam.
sn15.3:2.4: tesam vo matumaranam paccanubhontanam amanapasampayoga manapavippayoga kandantanam rodantanam assu passannam paggharitam, na tveva catusu mahasamuddesu udakam.
sn15.3:2.12: Digharattam vo, bhikkhave, rogabyasanam paccanubhutam, tesam vo rogabyasanam paccanubhontanam amanapasampayoga manapavippayoga kandantanam rodantanam assu passannam paggharitam, na tveva catusu mahasamuddesu udakam.
sn15.3:2.15: yavancidam, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasankharesu nibbinditum, alam virajjitum, alam vimuccitun”ti.
